rules_text:
{G}{W}{U} MODAL Choose your destiny one modal spell at a time.
{W}{U}{B} EXPERIENCE Split cards and graveyard-filling effects help build your creatures with experience checks.
{U}{B}{R} ARTIFACTS Noncreature spells, foreshadowed creatures, and Manuscript pages all read victory.
{B}{R}{G} FORESHADOW Threats are coming. Read ahead to learn more.
{R}{G}{W} ENTWINE Your modal spells have extra options when you wait to entwine them.
{W}{U} NARRATIVE Split cards and modal spells offer additional bonuses.
{U}{B} EXPERIENCE Loot, surveil, and mill your way to experience checks.
{B}{R} ARTIFACTS The spoils of adventure are yours to exploit.
{R}{G} FORESHADOW Something looms in the distance. Control the game until your monsters make a dramatic arrival.
{G}{W} SPLITS Narrative bonuses and experience checks benefit from your split cards.
